This works 100% for me. If you run into any problems, the fault is on your end. 

This is by far, the best tactical FPS I have ever played. I suggest everyone downloading this to install it this way instead:

1. Ghost Recon
2. Desert Siege expansion
3. Island Thunder expansion
4. Patch 1.4 (you won't need patch 1.3 if you have Island Thunder installed)
5. Apply crack

I also noticed that the Desert Siege ISO isn't properly compressed like the other ISOs in this torrent but it works perfectly fine so it doesn't really matter.
I was able to install the game including the patches. The only thing I cannot find is the patch . exe. where is it? I looked in all the folders that came with the download!
The crack is in Ghost Recon.iso
It works! I took forever toward the end of the download though. I am seeding.
